title: [Large-Scale] Training in Recognizing Instructors' Emotional Expressions in Mathematics Video Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental statistical concepts and proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A program to enhance corporate educators’/managers’ competencies in creating math education video content.

learning_goals: Learners can identify instructors' positive (happiness/satisfaction) and negative (boredom/frustration) emotional expressions in educational videos with 80% accuracy
Learners can distinguish emotional expression differences between virtual (animated) and human instructors to derive insights on learning effectiveness
Learners can explain the impact of expressed emotions on motivating learning through three or more examples.

resources: Math Lecture Video Samples with Emotional Expression Labeling
Online Assessment Platform with Real-Time Feedback Functionality

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
